name: streamdeck-toggl
description: Hassle-free time tracking using the Elgato Stream Deck and Toggl Track
author: Tobias MÃ¶ritz

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "PLUGIN,PI" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "parcel watch plugin/index.html -d dist/plugin/  --no-hmr --public-url ./  --log-level 4 --global connectElgatoStreamDeckSocket" "parcel watch pi/index.html -d dist/pi/  --public-url ./ --log-level 4  --no-hmr --global connectElgatoStreamDeckSocket" --kill-others
